# Contributing to BuildSage

Thanks for your interest in contributing to BuildSage! We welcome contributions that improve the construction trade experience for contractors.

## What We Accept

- **Bug fixes** — typos, broken formatting, incorrect trade terminology
- **Trade improvements** — better pitch angles, updated pricing ranges, new objection handlers
- **New trade templates** — if you work in a trade we don't cover yet (landscaping, painting, flooring, etc.)
- **Regional data** — pricing corrections for specific regions
- **Language support** — translations and localization

## What We Don't Accept

- Changes to the KwikReel API integration (this is managed by Barbarian Labs)
- New external API dependencies
- Skills that duplicate existing BuildSage functionality
- Marketing or promotional content for competing products

## How to Contribute

1. Fork the repository
2. Create a feature branch (`git checkout -b improve-roofing-pitch`)
3. Make your changes
4. Test with OpenClaw locally
5. Submit a Pull Request with a clear description

## Skill Writing Guidelines

- Follow the existing SKILL.md format and frontmatter structure
- Use direct, contractor-friendly language (no corporate jargon)
- Include specific examples for each trade
- Add disclaimers where appropriate (pricing, licensing, code compliance)
- Test on at least one OpenClaw messaging channel

## Code of Conduct

Be respectful. We're all here to help contractors do better work.

## Questions?

Open a Discussion or email hello@barbarianlabs.com.
